message:
I am interacting with the MCP server with name:
```
create_pr
```
and arguments:
```
{'repo_name': 'sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes', 'source_branch': 'feat/add-pr-ready-review-microagent', 'target_branch': 'main', 'title': 'feat: Add PR Ready to Review microagent', 'body': '## Description

This PR adds a new microagent to the SheepVibes repository that ensures all pull requests are immediately marked as "ready to review" after opening them.

## Changes Made

- Created `.openhands/microagents/pr-ready-review.md` microagent file
- The microagent provides guidance for marking PRs as ready immediately
- Includes workflow for PR creation with proper labels
- Provides error handling for authentication issues
- Integrates with existing repository rules

## Purpose

The microagent addresses the requirement to always mark PRs as "ready to review" immediately after opening them, rather than leaving them as draft PRs.

## Testing

- Microagent file created successfully in the correct location
- Follows the established microagent structure with YAML frontmatter
- Complements the existing SheepVibes Rules microagent

## Related Information

- Follows all repository rules and testing requirements
- Updates the microagent ecosystem for better PR management
', 'draft': 'false'}
```

message.content: Now I'll create a pull request using the create_pr function. Since there's no specific PR template, I'll create a comprehensive description.

arguments.body:
## Description

This PR adds a new microagent to the SheepVibes repository that ensures all pull requests are immediately marked as "ready to review" after opening them.

## Changes Made

- Created `.openhands/microagents/pr-ready-review.md` microagent file
- The microagent provides guidance for marking PRs as ready immediately
- Includes workflow for PR creation with proper labels
- Provides error handling for authentication issues
- Integrates with existing repository rules

## Purpose

The microagent addresses the requirement to always mark PRs as "ready to review" immediately after opening them, rather than leaving them as draft PRs.

## Testing

- Microagent file created successfully in the correct location
- Follows the established microagent structure with YAML frontmatter
- Complements the existing SheepVibes Rules microagent

## Related Information

- Follows all repository rules and testing requirements
- Updates the microagent ecosystem for better PR management
